subject.name: Ukwazi ukubona iziguli ezidinga ukunakekelwa okusingatha kudambise izinhlungu Nezimpawu zokugula
subject.info: Uma isiguli sinezinhlungu ezinkulu ezingasanqandeki noma ezingasalawuleki.

subject.name: Kuhlinzekwa nini noma kunikezwa nini ukunakekelwa okusingatha kudambise izinhlungu nezimpawu zokugula?
subject.info: Uma isiguli sidinga kunqandwe izinhlungu nezimpawu zokugula ukuze kuthuthukiswe izingalo kuphila kwaso?

subject.name: Uyeka nini ukunikeza ukunakekela okusinga thakudambise izinhlungu nezimpawu zokugula?
subject.info: Sinikeza isiguli ukunakekela okusingatha kudambise izinhlungu inqobonje uma sisa kudinga?

subject.name: Yini okumele yenziwe ezigulini uma izinhlungu zingabingcono?
subject.info: (1/2) Uma izinhlungu zingabingcono, ungadlulisela isiguli sakho e hospice (abanikezeli ngokunakekela okusingatha
subject.info2: (2/2) kudambise izinhlungu nezimpawu zokugula) ukuze banqande izinhlungu.

subject.name: Yini okumele yenziwe uma isiguli sibanjwe yizinhlungu ezixakile?
subject.info: Uma isiguli sisezinhlungwini ezixakile, kumele sidluliselwe e hospice noma esibhedlela ngokushesha.

subject.name: Yini okumele yenziwe uma isiguli sizwa kucanuzela inhliziyo?
subject.info: (1/3) Funa imbangela. Vimbela ukuba khona kwephunga elinamndla, ikakhulukazi iphunga lokudla. Nikeza isiguli kancane amasnekisi njengamashibsi
subject.info2: (2/3)anganathesti kanye nezinto eziphuzwayo. Isiguli kumele sibe sendaweni enokuthula. Uma ukucanuzela kwenhliziyo nokuphalaza kunganqamuki,
subject.info3: (3/3)isiguli singalaliswa esibhedlela ukuze sithole imithi enamandla kanye namanzi ngediliphu.

subject.name: Yini okumele yenziwe uma isiguli sihanjiswa isisu?
subject.info: (1/3)Buyisela amanzi alahlekile emzimbeni ukuvimbela ukuphelelwa kakhulu ngamanzi emzimbeni. Ncoma ukuthi isiguli sihlolwe igciwane I HIV kanyena masotsha
subject.info2: (2/3)omzimba ama CD4 uma isisu sesikhiphe isiguli ngaphezu kwamasonto amabili. Buyisela amanzi emzimbeni ngokunikeza isiguli isorol
subject.info3: (3/3)(okuyilitha yamanzi abilisiwe aphola kwafakwa amathisipuni awu 8 kashukela kanyenengxenyeÂ½ yethisipuni kasawoti ndawonye.

subject.name: Yini okumele yenziwe uma isiguli siphelelwa ngumoya?
subject.info: (1/2)Gcina isiguli sinokuthula sikhululekile. Umuntu mhlalise aqonde. Vula amafasitela usebenzise nefeni yokushayisa umoya.
subject.info2: (2/2)Mdlulise ukuze ayothola imithi yokwelapha imbangela ecashileyo kuphelelwa umoya aphinde athole nomoya okuthiwa iokhsijini uma kunesidingo.

subject.name: Yini okumele yenziwe uma isiguli sikhwehlela noma siphalaza igazi?
subject.info: Dlulisela isiguli esibhedlela NGOKUSHESHA

subject.name: Yini okumele yenziwe uma isiguli siphethwe iqolo nemilenze engenamandla
subject.info: Dlulisela isiguli esibhedlela NGOKUSHESHA

subject.name: Yini okumele yenziwe uma isiguli sidlikiza umzimba
subject.info: Lalisa isiguli phansi emhlabathini ngohlangothi langawesokunxele

subject.name: Yini okumele yenziwe uma isiguli siphazamiseke ngokomqondo
subject.info: Dlulisela isiguli esibhedlela NGOKUSHESHA

subject.name: Sihlanzwa kanjani isilonda sesiguli: Yini ozoyidinga
subject.info: (1/2)Indishi yokugeza enamanzi afudumele anosawoti, uvolo wokusula eceleni kwesilonda uma sigezwa, igozi,ibhandeshi,
subject.info2: (2/2)ipulasta, umuthi wokugcoba isilonda ongamafutha, isikhwama sokufaka amabhandishi angxolile.

subject.name: Sihlanzwa kanjani isilonda sesiguli: Amalungiselelo
subject.info: (1/2)Yenza isiqiniseko sokuthi isiguli sisendaweni esithekile emehlweni abantu, Sichazele ozokwenza,
subject.info2: (2/2)Hlamba izandla zakho ngokuphelelebese ufaka amagilavu.Susa amabhandishi namagozi angcolile.

subject.name: Sihlanzwa kanjani isilonda sesiguli: Ukuhlanzwa kwesilonda
subject.info: (1/2)Hlanza isilonda ngamanzi afudumele anosawoti usebenzisa uvolo. Yomisa inxeba ngovolo usebenzisa isandla esithambile.
subject.info2: (2/2)Gcoba igozi ngomuthi ongamafutha bese uvala ngayo isilonda. Bopha ngebhandishi noma ipulasta.

subject.name: Sihlanzwa kanjani isilonda sesiguli: Ngemuva kokuhlanzwa kwesilonda
subject.info: (1/2)Bheka ukuthi isiguli sihleli kahle noma silele kahle.Faka igozi namabhandishi angcolile ephaketheni bese ulahla
subject.info2: (2/2)iphakethe endaweni ephephile.Amabhandishi namagozi kungashiswa.Phinda uhlambe izandla ngamanzi nensipho.

subject.name: Unakekelwa kanjani umlomo wesiguli?
subject.info: (1/2)Khuthaza isiguli ukugeza amazinyo njalo ngebhulashi lamazinyo kusetshenziswa amanzi anosawoti (okuyithisipuni kasawoti ezinkomishini ezimbili
subject.info2: (2/2)zamanzi abiliswe aphinde apholiswa) njengesihlanzamlomo. Sebenzisa umuthi wokuxubha njalo uma ugunyazwe udokotela.

subject.name: Sigezwa kanjani isiguli esingasavuki embhedeni: Yini ozoyidinga
subject.info: (1/2)Indishi yokugeza enamanzi afudumele, insipho, indwangu yokugeza ubuso, ithawula, ibhula shilo kuxubha nomuthi wokuxubha, ikamu, izinto zokugcoba,
subject.info2: (2/2)ukhilimu wokushefa. Izifutho ezinamakha anuka kamnandi, izingubo ezihlanzekile, amashidi ahlanzekile nezingubo zokulala.

subject.name: Sigezwa kanjani isiguli esingasavuki embhedeni: Amalungiselelo
subject.info: (1/2)Yenza isiqinise kosokuthi isiguli sisendaweni esithekile emehlweni abantu, Chazela isiguli ozokwenza. Vala amafasitela neminyango.
subject.info2: (2/2)Nikeza isiguli ithuba lokuthi sichithe amanzi (sichame) noma sizikhulule. Susa zonke izingubo embhedeni ngaphandle kweshidi elingaphansi. Khumula isiguli.

subject.name: Sigezwa kanjani isiguli esingasavuki embhedeni: Ukugeza isiguli
subject.info: (1/2)Qala ngobuso, Sebenzisa insipho eyanele, Yenza isiqiniseko sokuthi uyisusa yonke insipho ebusweni. Sula isikhumba some kahle,
subject.info2: (2/2)ikakhulukazi phakathi kwezinzwane, ngaphansi kwamabele, emakhwapheni naphakathi kwamathanga, phansi kwesisu nasezinqeni.

subject.name: Sigezwa kanjani isiguli esingasavuki embhedeni: Emvakokugeza
subject.info: (1/2)Gqokisa isiguli izingubo ezihlanzekile. Ginqela isiguli ngakolunye uhlangothi lombhede ukuze ushintshe ubhulanketh inomaishidi,
subject.info2: (2/2)bese uphinda usiginqe laphezu kobhulankethi noma ishidi elihlanzekile. Mbathisa isiguli ngobhulankethi bese uyachaza ukuthi usuqedile.

subject.name: Zingavinjelwa kanjani izilonda ezivela uma isiguli singasakwazi ukuvuka embhedeni?
subject.info: (1/3)Siza isiguli ngokuthi sinyakaze njalo ukunciphisa ukucindezeleka kwesikhumba isikhathi eside. Shintshanisa izikhathi,
subject.info2: (2/3)njengokuthi ngesinye isikhathi kumele isiguli silale ngomhlane, Ngesinye isikhathi sihlale Ngesinye isikhathi silale kodwa sithi ukuphakanyiswa kancane esingenhla.
subject.info3: (3/3)Yeseka isiguli ngemiqamelo nobhulankethi, ikakhulukazi phakathi kwamadolo, ngaphansi kwezithende kanye nasemhlane.

subject.name: Zelashwa kanjani izilonda eseziqalile?
subject.info: (1/2)Sebenzisa izinto zokubopha isilonda ezithambile ukuze isicubu esisha sithole ithuba lokukhula. Qaphela amagciwane.
subject.info2: (2/2)Fundisa isiguli ngokunyakaza siphenduke njalo nokususa isisindo somzimba ezindaweni ezahlukahlukene zomzimba.

subject.name: Ungakuvikela kanjani ukusabalala Kwamagciwane e TB?
subject.info: (1/2)Mboza umlomo uma ukhwehlela noma khwehlelela endololwaneni, Cela nesiguli sense kanjalo. Vula amafasitela. Khuthaza abantu
subject.info2: (2/2)abadla amaphilisi e TB ukuthi kumele bawadle bangawayeki kuze kuphele izinyanga eziyisithupha.

subject.name: Kuvikelwa kanjani ukusabalala kweHIV: Ulwazi olwejwayelekile
subject.info: (1/2)Hlala ngokuhlolela igciwane I HIV. Uma ungumuntu ohlala ngokuthintana negazi noma amanzi aphuma emzimbeni womuntu,
subject.info2: (2/2)kumele ukuqaphele ukuthi noma imuphi umuntu angabanegciwane I HIV noma ngabe ubukeka ephila.

subject.name: Kuvikelwa kanjani ukusabalala kweHIV: Ukugcaba
subject.info: (1/3)Faka amagilavu. Bulala amagciwane kwinsingo yakho noma kwizinto zakho osebenzangazo abantu ngaphambi kokuthi uphinde
subject.info2: (2/3)uzisebenzise ngokuzibilisa emanzini noma usebenzise I bhlishi ingxenye eyodwa yebhlishi uyifaka ezingxenyeni
subject.info3: (3/3)eziyisithupha zamanzi. Lahla ileza uma sewuyisebenzisile bese usebenzisa entsha kumuntu olandelayo.

subject.name: Ukuxhumana neziguli
subject.info: (1/5)Lalela lokho isiguli esikushoyo, qaphela esikukhulumayo ngomzimba waso, uphinde wazi nezigaba isiguli esidlula kuzona uma
subject.info2: (2/5)sinobuhlungu obunzima bomphefumulo ngenxayokugula. 1)kwisigaba sokuqala isiguli sishaya sengathi akukho nkinga konke kuhamb akahle,
subject.info3: (3/5) 2) kwisigaba sesibili isiguli sibanolaka nentukuthelo, 3) Kwisigaba sesithathu isiguli singasola umdali noma amadlozi
subject.info4: (4/5) njengokuthi ukubesenza (isiguli) umsebenzi ngabe asikho ngaphansi kwalesimo 4). Kwisigaba sesine isiguli sizizwa umoya ushona phansi sinosizo
subject.info5: (5/5) 5). Kwisigaba sokugcina sesihlanu isiguli siyasemukela isimo esinzima sokugula kwaso.

subject.name: Ukuxhumana nabantwana
subject.info: Qonda ukuthi ubuhlungu obunzima bomphefumulo ngenxa yokugula kubantwana kuzohluka kunokwabantu abadala

subject.name: Sidluliswa kanjani isiguli
subject.info: Shayela ucingo abantu baseHospice abaseduze nawe usebenzisa inombolo yocingo yomuntu okuxhunywana nayekwaHospice.

subject.name: Iziphi izifo ezifanele ukudluliselwa kunakekelo olusingatha ludambise izinhlungu nezimpawu zokugula.
subject.info: Izinhlungu nezimpawu ezibalwe kuluhla olungenhla.

subject.name: Ubonakanjani ukuthi isiguli sesiyahamba emhlabeni
subject.info: (1/2)Isiguli silala kakhulu, singanqaba ukudla, asikwazi ukugwinya kalula, siyaquleka, izingalo nemilenze kuqala ukubanda,
subject.info2: (2/2)siphefumula kancane, siqale ukuphelelwa umoya, kunamanzi ashaya emphinjeni.

subject.name: Yini okumele yenziwe uma isiguli sesihamba emhlabeni
subject.info: (1/3)Gcina isiguli sihlanzekile silele kahle, misa ukunikezwa kwemithi uma sekunzima ukugwinya, habulisa isiguli kancane amanzi ngenkathi sisakwazi ukugwinya.
subject.info2: (2/3)Gcina umlomo wesiguli uswakeme uhlanzekile, hlala eduze kwesiguli, khulumela phansi ukhumbule
subject.info3: (3/3)ukuthi isiguli kungenzeka sikuzwe noma ngabe sibukeka siqulekile
